General.Name: Berenson Acquisition Corp I
General.Description: Berenson Acquisition Corp. I does not have significant operations. The company intends to effect a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. It focuses on identifying business combination targets in the software and technology-enabled services industry. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.
General.Address: 667 Madison Avenue, New York, NY, United States, 10065
